code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./SideBar.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SideBar(_ref){let{repos,onRepoSelect,onCloneRepo}=_ref;const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleCloneRepo=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{await onCloneRepo();}catch(error){console.error("Error cloning repo:",error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Repositories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:repos.map((repo,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>onRepoSelect(repo),children:repo},index))}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Cloning Repo..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"clone-repo-btn",onClick:handleCloneRepo,children:"Clone Repo"})]});}export default SideBar;
